synopsis.text: Man aging to survive a gruesome massacre that left his entire class dead, Ganta Igarashi finds himself unjustly accused and sentenced to death for the very crime he was a victim of. His sentence takes him to Deadman Wonderland, a twisted prison that doubles as a macabre amusement park where inmates are forced to participate in deadly games for the entertainment of spectators. As he navigates through this brutal world, Ganta forms an unlikely alliance with a peculiar inmate named Shiro, and discovers his own ability to manipulate his blood as a weapon. Determined to clear his name and uncover the truth behind the enigmatic 'Red Man', Ganta must fight for survival in a place where death lurks around every corner.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
